name: Margherita Classic
smallDescription: A timeless classic with fresh ingredients.
bigDescription: The Margherita Classic features a delicious combination of fresh tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella cheese, and a hint of basil, delivering a traditional Italian flavor.

name: Truffle Mushroom Haven
smallDescription: A luxurious blend of truffle and mushrooms.
bigDescription: Truffle Mushroom Haven combines the earthy flavors of mushrooms with the rich aroma of truffle oil, topped with gooey cheese for a premium experience.

name: Pepperoni Supreme
smallDescription: A meat lover's delight with spicy pepperoni.
bigDescription: Pepperoni Supreme is packed with generous slices of spicy pepperoni on a bed of rich tomato sauce and melted cheese, creating a zesty, savory flavor.

name: Caprese Charm
smallDescription: A refreshing mix of tomatoes and basil.
bigDescription: Caprese Charm brings together juicy tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and aromatic basil leaves, drizzled with olive oil for a light and delightful taste.

name: Truffle Parmesan Crust
smallDescription: A cheesy crust with a hint of truffle.
bigDescription: Truffle Parmesan Crust is a unique pizza featuring a crispy crust layered with parmesan cheese and infused with the subtle flavor of truffle oil.

name: Four Cheese Extravaganza
smallDescription: A blend of four rich cheeses.
bigDescription: The Four Cheese Extravaganza combines mozzarella, cheddar, gouda, and parmesan cheeses for a creamy, indulgent flavor that melts in your mouth.

name: Farmhouse Delight
smallDescription: Fresh veggies for a wholesome treat.
bigDescription: Farmhouse Delight offers a vibrant mix of freshly chopped vegetables, paired with melted cheese and a tangy tomato base for a healthy and flavorful option.

name: Roasted Veggie Medley
bigDescription: Roasted Veggie Medley features a savory mix of roasted bell peppers, zucchini, and onions topped with melted cheese and a crisp crust.

name: Tomato Basil Bliss
smallDescription: Simple and fresh with tomatoes and basil.
bigDescription: Tomato Basil Bliss combines the sweetness of fresh tomato slices with fragrant basil, delivering a simple yet flavorful pizza experience.
